TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClusterUpgradeDeltaHealthPolicy extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Describes the delta health policies for the cluster upgrade.

MemberSignature.Value: public ClusterUpgradeDeltaHealthPolicy (int maxPercentDeltaUnhealthyNodes, int maxPercentUpgradeDomainDeltaUnhealthyNodes, int maxPercentDeltaUnhealthyApplications);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 maxPercentDeltaUnhealthyNodes, int32 maxPercentUpgradeDomainDeltaUnhealthyNodes, int32 maxPercentDeltaUnhealthyApplications) cil managed
Public Sub New (maxPercentDeltaUnhealthyNodes As Integer, maxPercentUpgradeDomainDeltaUnhealthyNodes As Integer, maxPercentDeltaUnhealthyApplications As Integer)

Docs.param: The maximum allowed percentage of nodes health degradation allowed during cluster upgrades. The delta is measured between the state of the nodes at the beginning of upgrade and the state of the nodes at the time of the health evaluation. The check is performed after every upgrade domain upgrade completion to make sure the global state of the cluster is within tolerated limits.

The maximum allowed percentage of upgrade domain nodes health degradation allowed during cluster upgrades. The delta is measured between the state of the upgrade domain nodes at the beginning of upgrade and the state of the upgrade domain nodes at the time of the health evaluation. The check is performed after every upgrade domain upgrade completion for all completed upgrade domains to make sure the state of the upgrade domains is within tolerated limits.

The maximum allowed percentage of applications health degradation allowed during cluster upgrades. The delta is measured between the state of the applications at the beginning of upgrade and the state of the applications at the time of the health evaluation. The check is performed after every upgrade domain upgrade completion to make sure the global state of the cluster is within tolerated limits. System services are not included in this.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of ClusterUpgradeDeltaHealthPolicy.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationDeltaHealthPolicies As IDictionary(Of String, ApplicationDeltaHealthPolicy)

Docs.summary: Defines the application delta health policy map used to evaluate the health of an application or one of its child entities when upgrading the cluster.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaxPercentDeltaUnhealthyApplications : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The maximum allowed percentage of applications health degradation allowed during cluster upgrades. The delta is measured between the state of the applications at the beginning of upgrade and the state of the applications at the time of the health evaluation. The check is performed after every upgrade domain upgrade completion to make sure the global state of the cluster is within tolerated limits. System services are not included in this.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaxPercentDeltaUnhealthyNodes : int with get, set

Docs.summary: The maximum allowed percentage of nodes health degradation allowed during cluster upgrades. The delta is measured between the state of the nodes at the beginning of upgrade and the state of the nodes at the time of the health evaluation. The check is performed after every upgrade domain upgrade completion to make sure the global state of the cluster is within tolerated limits.

The maximum allowed percentage of upgrade domain nodes health degradation allowed during cluster upgrades. The delta is measured between the state of the upgrade domain nodes at the beginning of upgrade and the state of the upgrade domain nodes at the time of the health evaluation. The check is performed after every upgrade domain upgrade completion for all completed upgrade domains to make sure the state of the upgrade domains is within tolerated limits.
